title: NENONA Women's 2025 Fall Sweater Dress Winter Long Sleeve Button Elegant Formal Party Mini Dresses
description: Quality: Crafted with premium knit fabric, soft to touch and skin-friendly, this mini dress is a blend of elegance and comfort, featuring ample elasticity, it contours perfectly to your curves.
Design: Long sleeve, round neckline, empire waist, gold-tone textured buttons, seamed waistband detail, a line mini skirt with two non-functional button flaps, nice as a business casual work dress

This chic knit dress is a staple piece for year-round styling, the waistline enhances a woman's figure, accentuating curves with elegance and style. Pair it with a necklace, and heels to transform into a cocktail dress, perfect for weddings or transform it into an office dress look- easily gliding between casual and formal events.

Occasion: Perfect for any semi-formal event or evening out, whether it's work, office suit, business casual, church, school functions, graduations, nights out, clubs, cocktails, weddings, romantic dates, engagements, event casual street.
Easy Care: Machine wash is recommended with a laundry bag, do not bleach, and hang to dry.
